# timescale_connector_s3 (Resource)

Manages an S3 connector for continuous data import from S3 buckets.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket` (String) S3 bucket name.
- `credentials` (Attributes) S3 authentication credentials. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--credentials))
- `definition` (Attributes) File format definition (CSV or PARQUET). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--definition))
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the connector.
- `pattern` (String) Pattern to match S3 object keys (supports wildcards).
- `service_id` (String) The service ID to attach the connector to.
- `table_identifier` (Attributes) Target table identifier. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--table_identifier))

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the connector is enabled (default: true) .
- `frequency` (String) Cron expression for sync frequency: @always, @5minutes, @10minutes, @15minutes, @30minutes, @hourly, @daily, @weekly, @monthly, @annually, @yearly
- `on_conflict_do_nothing` (Boolean) Handle conflicts by doing nothing (ignore conflicting rows). Defaults to false.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the connector was created.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the S3 connector.
- `last_error` (String) Last error message if sync failed.
- `last_imported_object` (String) Last successfully imported S3 object key.
- `next_tick` (String) Next scheduled sync time.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the connector was last updated.

<a id="nestedatt--credentials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `credentials`

Required:

- `type` (String) Credential type: 'Public' or 'RoleARN'.

Optional:

- `role_arn` (String) IAM role ARN (required if type is 'RoleARN').


<a id="nestedatt--definition"></a>
### Nested Schema for `definition`

Required:

- `type` (String) File type: 'CSV' or 'PARQUET'.

Optional:

- `csv` (Attributes) CSV file configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--definition--csv))
- `parquet` (Attributes) Parquet file configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--definition--parquet))

<a id="nestedatt--definition--csv"></a>
### Nested Schema for `definition.csv`

Optional:

- `auto_column_mapping` (Boolean) Automatically map columns by name (mutually exclusive with column_names and column_mappings).
- `column_mappings` (Attributes List) Column mappings from source to destination (mutually exclusive with column_names and auto_column_mapping). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--definition--csv--column_mappings))
- `column_names` (List of String) Column names (mutually exclusive with column_mappings and auto_column_mapping).
- `delimiter` (String) CSV delimiter (default: ',').
- `skip_header` (Boolean) Whether to skip the first row as header (default: false).

<a id="nestedatt--definition--csv--column_mappings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `definition.csv.column_mappings`

Required:

- `destination` (String) Destination column name.
- `source` (String) Source column name.



<a id="nestedatt--definition--parquet"></a>
### Nested Schema for `definition.parquet`

Optional:

- `auto_column_mapping` (Boolean) Automatically map columns by name (mutually exclusive with column_mappings).
- `column_mappings` (Attributes List) Column mappings from source to destination (mutually exclusive with auto_column_mapping). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--definition--parquet--column_mappings))

<a id="nestedatt--definition--parquet--column_mappings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `definition.parquet.column_mappings`

Required:

- `destination` (String) Destination column name.
- `source` (String) Source column name.




<a id="nestedatt--table_identifier"></a>
### Nested Schema for `table_identifier`

Required:

- `table_name` (String) Table name.

Optional:

- `schema_name` (String) Schema name (defaults to 'public').
